content: Once you make it into Bushui Cave, continue through the area until you come across Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top. Climb the stairs after defeating them and follow the path around to the right to find the Bull Governor.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bull_Governor_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Bull Governor Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Bull Governor Location'.
The content is as follows:
Once you make it into Bushui Cave, continue through the area until you come across Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top. Climb the stairs after defeating them and follow the path around to the right to find the Bull Governor.
